Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A trio of windows dressed in robin's egg sheer silk drapes fills the eastern wall, the window frames painted in a pale creamy yellow color that complements the rose blush ivory of the walls and the pale cream limestone tiles of the floor. Statuary in monochromatic hues of cream and white marble fill the floor space atop pale blue carpeting. The largest pieces of the collection fill the center most portion of the room with smaller statues filling the spaces in between and the smallest arranged on pedestals around the perimeter. Busts of historical figures, Greco-Roman gods and goddesses as well as religious icons fill the room in a mixture of sizes and styles, each one lit from above by small hanging chandeliers that fill the airy room with flickering golden illumination.

Statuary in monochromatic hues of cream and white marble fill the floor space atop pale blue carpeting. Busts of historical figures, Greco-Roman gods and goddesses as well as religious icons fill the room in a mixture of sizes and styles, each one lit from above by small hanging chandeliers that fill the airy room with flickering golden illumination.
an arched double door leading north

Each side of the arched double door leading to the north is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading south

Each side of the arched double door leading to the south is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)

Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
